translation.en: You try to be cool and waste your time partying.
I don't know you anymore. You're not swimming. You're not doing anything.
translation.ja: 〈泳がないし何も頑張ってない〉

translation.en: You're never going to achieve anything.
[Sven in English] Right, OK.
You missed the second turn. Your frequency was too slow in the last 25 meters. What's wrong?
translation.ja: 終盤のストロークが遅かったどうした？

translation.en: Nothing.
-Sure? -Yes.
OK. I wanted to tell you later,
translation.ja: あとで伝える気だったが

translation.en: but I have something that will make you smile.
translation.ja: 笑顔になれる話がある

translation.en: What?
I heard the International Olympic Committee gave a press conference, and they were announcing help for refugee athletes.
translation.ja: ＩＯＣが難民の選手を援助すると発表した

translation.en: They're forming a refugee team for Rio.
translation.ja: 難民選手団ができるんだ

translation.en: OK.
I sent them your times and told them about your swim across the sea,
translation.ja: 君のタイムと泳いで海を渡った話を伝えた

translation.en: and, hey, if we work hard and your times improve, you can get onto the team.
translation.ja: タイムを伸ばせば選手団に入れると言われたよ

translation.en: What?
If you had the chance, would you want to compete
translation.ja: 実力で出場できるのと⸺

translation.en: because you were good enough or because people felt sorry for you?
translation.ja: 同情で出してもらえるのは違う

translation.en: I want to go to the Olympics more than anything.
translation.ja: 五輪出場は一番の夢だけど

translation.en: But when I go, I will be there swimming for my country.
translation.ja: 私はシリアの代表として出たい

translation.en: [Yusra] I'm sorry.
About what I said last night.
You meant it.
Not in the way I said it.
You're so soft on the outside. So hard underneath.
translation.ja: あんたって優しいけど実は厳しい

translation.en: But I kind of admire this about you.
translation.ja: そこを尊敬してるけど

translation.en: I'm so happy you're swimming.
Sven called, by the way.
About the refugee team.
You should do it.
This was everything you ever wanted.
translation.ja: ずっと望んでたでしょ

translation.en: Not in the way I want it.
Yeah, but nothing has been the way we wanted it.
translation.ja: 何もかも望みどおりじゃない

translation.en: Why would this be any different?
I want to swim for Syria.
No. That's what Baba wanted.
translation.ja: 違う　それはパパの望みよ

translation.en: Baba ever tell you why he stopped swimming for Syria?
translation.ja: パパが引退した理由を聞いた？

translation.en: Military service.
He was actually very good. At the beginning, I thought it was an excuse, but it wasn't.
translation.ja: 言い訳なんかじゃない強い選手だった

translation.en: And he had to lose two years of training just to carry a gun.
translation.ja: 銃を持つためだけに２年間 練習できなかった

translation.en: Life is not fair.
I'm Sara Mardini.
I have no country anymore.
translation.ja: もう何人(なにじん)でもない

translation.en: This might be the only opportunity of your life.
translation.ja: 一度きりのチャンスかもよ

translation.en: Look at me.
Don't be stupid. Take it.
Oh, I was looking for you.
translation.ja: スヴェン 捜してた

translation.en: I wanted to go to the Olympics for Team Syria, but if I can't, I'd like to swim for Team Sven.
translation.ja: シリア代表になれないならスヴェンの教え子代表になる

translation.en: If you still want me to, even though I'm stupid, and I don't deserve it.
translation.ja: 私がバカだっただから今更かもしれないけど

translation.en: For 2020, we will train for Syria, but for 2016, I'm Team Refugee.
translation.ja: 2020年はシリア代表に2016年は難民選手団に入る

translation.en: We have a lot of work to do.
Ready?
[Ezzat in Arabic] Tell me about your training.
[Yusra] Of course, Baba.
[Ezzat] I want you to describe every detail.
The feeling underwater.
Every stroke, every move you make.
[in English] I want to know what this German has done.
translation.ja: ドイツ人の指導を知りたい

translation.en: That was kind of "flop-flop." No, you have to…
translation.ja: “パタパタ”じゃなくてもっと…

translation.en: The head is too high. Focus on the elbow.
translation.ja: 頭が高すぎる　肘に意識を

translation.en: OK?
What was my time?
Sven? What was my time?
translation.ja: スヴェン タイムは？

translation.en: -We're going to Rio. -No.
-We're going to Rio. -We're going to Rio?
translation.ja: 五輪出場だ リオに？

translation.en: We're going to Rio!
-Hey! We are going to Rio! -[Yusra screams]
But I can't stop thinking about them.
I saw on Facebook that 100,000 people had to cross the sea to Greece in the last two months.
translation.ja: この２か月で10万人が海を渡ってギリシャに来た

translation.en: You know, what we've been through isn't special.
translation.ja: 私たちは特別じゃない

translation.en: Well…
What I saw on Facebook was this place in Sonnenallee
translation.ja: 僕が聞いたのはベルリンでシリア出身者が

translation.en: run by this guy from Damascus. He makes the same whipped ice cream that he made back there.
translation.ja: 故郷の味のアイスを売ってる店があるって話だ

translation.en: We should try it.
[mother in Arabic] An Olympian, my own daughter. An Olympian, I don't believe it.
translation.ja: 〈娘が五輪選手なんて信じられない〉

translation.en: All that time at the poolside wasn't for nothing.
translation.ja: 〈努力は無駄にならなかった〉

translation.en: It's good. It's as it should be.
And Sara? You didn't have the times?
Even for this refugee team?
No, Baba. I didn't.
"Refugee team"? You say it like it doesn't count.
translation.ja: 〈“難民選手団”が無価値みたいな言い方〉

translation.en: Nice tracksuit.
-[Yusra] What have you done? -It's good at the back?
translation.ja: どうしたの？ 後ろはどう？

translation.en: [Yusra] It's beautiful.
[Sara] I always wanted it short.
I wanna tell you something.
I've decided…
I'm going back to Lesbos.
[in Arabic] What?
[in English] I found this organization, and I've been emailing them, and they help everyone who's crossing.
translation.ja: あの海を渡る人たちを助ける団体を見つけたの

translation.en: -I want to be part of this. -No, Sara, please.
translation.ja: 手伝いたい ダメだよ私たちは未来に向かわないと

translation.en: We need to move on, go forward.
translation.ja: ダメだよ私たちは未来に向かわないと

translation.en: -What are you doing? -I need to be there. To help everyone.
translation.ja: 戻らないで 私たちが得られなかったものを…

translation.en: Give them water, shoes, everything we didn't have.
translation.ja: 水や靴もみんなにあげたいの

translation.en: You know, Mama, Shahed, Baba will come the same way, maybe.
translation.ja: ママたちも危険な方法で来るかも

translation.en: So you won't come with me to Rio?
Look, you were right. I've never done anything with my life.
translation.ja: 言われたとおり何も頑張ってなかった

translation.en: This is the first time I feel this.
Look, you can move on. You can become an Olympian.
translation.ja: ユスラは未来に進んで五輪に出て

translation.en: I can't.
This is the right thing for me.
translation.ja: 私がやるべきことなの

translation.en: Nizar.
[Nizar] What's this?
[Yusra] I was going to wait for your birthday. Happy early birthday! [chuckles]
translation.ja: 誕生日に渡す気だったけどおめでとう

translation.en: You remembered my birthday?
You're not allowed to give up.
-Thank you. -No, thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう こちらこそ

translation.en: Maybe you are my favorite cousin.
translation.ja: お気に入りのはとこかも

translation.en: I don't believe you. You said this to Sara last week, so…
translation.ja: サラにもそう言ったでしょ

translation.en: I think I'll get going. I'll leave you prepare your stuff.
translation.ja: もう行くよ準備の邪魔はしない

translation.en: [in Arabic] Uh… You've made us walk taller.
Don't worry about winning.
I am so proud of you.
Peace.
[in English] Bye.
[woman on PA] Next stop, the Olympic Village.
[man in English] Welcome to Rio de Janeiro.
11,238 athletes from 207 nations
gathering to take part in the Games of the 31st Olympiad,
translation.ja: 第31回オリンピックのため集まりました

translation.en: the greatest sporting spectacle in the world.
translation.ja: 世界最大のスポーツの祭典です

translation.en: [Yusra] Thank you.
-What's that? -I don't know!
[man] But one new team has been generating a special buzz.
translation.ja: ある新チームが注目を集めます

translation.en: The Refugee Olympic Team.
-So, Yusra, welcome to Rio. -Thank you.
translation.ja: リオへようこそ どうも

translation.en: -Oh my God, that's David Rudisha. -Who?
translation.ja: デイヴィッド･ルディシャがいる 誰？

translation.en: Don't you know anybody?
I've been swimming since I was a kid.
translation.ja: 子供の頃から泳いでた

translation.en: [man on PA] Welcome to the world-famous Maracanã Stadium
translation.ja: 〝ユスラ参上〞 世界的に有名なマラカナン･スタジアムで 世界的に有名なマラカナン･スタジアムで

translation.en: in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, for the opening ceremony.
translation.ja: 世界的に有名なマラカナン･スタジアムで 開会式が始まります

translation.en: [woman on PA] They have traveled from all corners of the earth
translation.ja: 世界各地から集まった選手は

translation.en: and have spent a lifetime training for this moment.
translation.ja: この瞬間のため生涯をかけてきました

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, the great moment has arrived.
translation.ja: 記念すべき時が訪れました

translation.en: [announcer] We welcome the Refugee Olympic Team.
translation.ja: 難民選手団の登場です

translation.en: [man on PA] A journey that has taken the flame all the way from Greece to Rio.
translation.ja: はるかギリシャから聖火が届けられました

translation.en: [all chanting] Refugees!
Sara!
Sara!
[screams] Sara!
I want to know, for everyone out there, what's been your main motivation…
translation.ja: あなたのモチベーションは…

translation.en: [girl 1] That's the Syrian girl that's racing today.
translation.ja: 今日 出るシリアの子よ

translation.en: [girl 2] I mean, I'm all for charity, but…
translation.ja: チャリティーは大事だけど…

translation.en: [girl 1] Exactly. The rest of us had to work to be here.
translation.ja: 私たちは努力して来てるのにね

translation.en: [Yusra on TV] Yeah, it's such an honor to be part of it.
It's a chance to be a voice and to give hope.
translation.ja: 苦しむ人々に希望を与えたい

translation.en: [Sara] So, aren't you about to swim your race?
-Yes. -What are you doing sitting on your ass?
translation.ja: うん なら立たないと

translation.en: How do you--
[Yusra screeches] I can't believe you're here!
This is crazy!
Sister.
How did you get here?
translation.ja: どうやって ここに？

translation.en: I contacted the sponsor of the refugee team,
translation.ja: 難民選手団のスポンサーに

translation.en: and I told them that I was the sister of the world-famous Yusra Mardini.
translation.ja: “あのユスラの姉だ”って言ったら手配してくれた

translation.en: -And I even flew business class. -What?!
translation.ja: ビジネスクラスを 私はエコノミーなのに

translation.en: -We were in economy. -I don't fly economy, habibi.
translation.ja: 私はエコノミーなのに ケチくさい

translation.en: -And what about Lesbos? -I'm gonna go straight after.
translation.ja: レスボス島は？ このあと行く

translation.en: I wanna show you something.
[in Arabic] Good luck, my love. I'm not worried because you're lucky.
translation.ja: 〈心配してないわユスラは幸運だから〉

translation.en: Luck has nothing to do with it. Remember everything I've taught you.
translation.ja: 〈運は関係ない私の教えを思い出せ〉

translation.en: Yalla, Shahed.
I hope you win.
[in English] Good luck, Yusra. We love you. We miss you.
translation.ja: 頑張って　愛してる早く会いたい

translation.en: So grown-up!
[Shada] Good luck.
[Sara] Actually, I didn't really wanna show you this one.
translation.ja: 本当は見せたくなかった

translation.en: [Yusra] Why? Is she back in Eritrea?
translation.ja: なぜ？彼女は故郷に戻ったの？

translation.en: Is she safe?
I heard other swimmers talking.
They said I shouldn't be here.
translation.ja: 私をズルいと言ってた

translation.en: They said I don't deserve it.
Well, they're right. You shouldn't.
translation.ja: その人たちの言うとおり

translation.en: You should be at the bottom of the Greek sea.
translation.ja: 溺死しとくべきだった

translation.en: Or sleeping on the roadside of Hungaria.
translation.ja: ハンガリーの道端で寝てるか

translation.en: Or you should be dead in a hole in Dariyya.
translation.ja: 故郷で死ぬのがふさわしかった

translation.en: I just wanna be a swimmer.
You know Olympians are people who are supposed to do amazing things.
translation.ja: 五輪選手は偉業を達成するべきよ

translation.en: Don't do that.
Remember what Baba used to say?
"Find your lane. Swim your race."
It's all bullshit.
[man on PA] Please welcome the athletes in heat one of the women's 100m butterfly.
translation.ja: 女子100ｍバタフライ選手入場です

translation.en: [Sara] You should swim for all of us.
translation.ja: みんなのために泳いで

translation.en: [Sara] You should swim for Baba because he didn't.
translation.ja: 水泳をやめたパパのために

translation.en: Swim for me
because I couldn't.
Swim for Sven because he couldn't.
translation.ja: 出場できなかったスヴェンのために

translation.en: Swim for Shada.
Swim for Razan Haddad.
[man on PA] Swimming for Qatar in lane two, Nada Arakji.
translation.ja: 第２レーンはカタール代表ナダ･アラクジ

translation.en: And for everyone who died trying to find a new life.
translation.ja: 新生活を求めて死んだ全ての人のために

translation.en: Swim for them.
[man on PA] Swimming in lane three for Rwanda, Johanna Umurungi.
translation.ja: 第３レーンはルワンダ代表ジョハンナ･ウムルンギ

translation.en: You're so much more than an Olympian.
translation.ja: ただの五輪選手じゃない

translation.en: [man on PA] Swimming in lane four for the Refugee Olympic Team,
translation.ja: 第４レーンは難民選手団の

translation.en: Yusra Mardini.
[announcer] Take your marks.
-Yusra, go! -Faster!
-[sobbing] -Yusra!
-Are you racing me? -Are we racing?
translation.ja: 競ってる？ そう思う？

translation.en: Sara, please, I'm tired.
-No one's forcing you to race. -I hate you.
translation.ja: なら止まれば？ 大嫌い

translation.en: You love me!
Kiss my Olympic ass.
I'm gonna kick your Olympic ass!
